mapper.select: SELECT `da`.id AS `devActiveId` , `da`.dev_id AS `devId`, `da`.close_time AS `devActiveCloseTime`, `da`.open_time AS `devActiveOpenTime`, `da`.user AS `userId`, `u`.cUserName AS `userName`, `d`.name AS `devName`, `d`.type AS `devTypeId`, `dt`.name AS `devTypeName`, `d`.region AS `regionId`, `r`.name AS `regionName`, `d`.site AS `devSite` FROM (SELECT * FROM t_dev_active WHERE 1 = 1 AND t_dev_active.dev_id = #{devId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t_dev_active.user = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )AS `da` LEFT JOIN t_dev AS `d` ON `da`.dev_id = `d`.id LEFT JOIN t_dev_type AS `dt` ON `d`.type = `dt`.id LEFT JOIN t_user AS `u` ON `da`.USER = `u`.iUserID LEFT JOIN t_region AS `r` ON `d`.region = `r`.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND `dt`.id = #{devTypeId} AND `dt`.name '%' #{devName} '%' AND `r`.id = #{regionId} AND `r`.name = #{regionName} AND `d`.customer = #{customerId}
